short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Chat, alternating backgrounds, larger emotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Works with Beta site only currently.*
Enhance your live chat experience with Floatplane DarkChat extension. This lightweight and easy-to-use extension is designed to improve the readability and visual appeal of live chat interfaces. With just one click, you can instantly apply a sleek dark theme and resize emotes for a better viewing experience.

Features:

Dark Mode: Transform your live chat interface with an elegant dark theme. This feature adjusts the background color of the livestream view, chat input container, and chat message list, making it easier on your eyes during long browsing sessions.

Emote Resizer: Enjoy bigger and more expressive emotes with our emote resizing feature. This functionality automatically scales up emotes to 60x60 pixels, allowing you to see every detail and better express yourself during live chats.

Alternate Row Coloring: Improve the readability of chat messages by applying alternate row coloring, making it easier to distinguish between individual messages.

Custom Scrollbar: Enhance your scrolling experience with a custom-designed scrollbar that matches the dark theme.

To get started, simply install the extension and let it automatically work its magic on supported live chat interfaces. Try the Floatplane DarkChat today!
